column2: Province $FROM$ is being offered to us.
We are now able to integrate this province into our domain.
Bardiche is a uniquely Russian weapon, probably developed from Nordic great axe. Throughout centuries this huge weapon had been the most prominent feature of any Russian army.
With the ever increasing development and implementation of gunpowder weapons, it is now time to incorporate best of both worlds.

For centuries our rulers have either completely ignored West, or observed it with utter distrust. Now, West is the center of innovation and new ides. With our newly aquired harbors we may now actually connect with the rest of the world.

Since times of Vikings and Varyigs, Ryurik and Rus', lands on the eastern borders of Russian Principalities were known for the Samur's fur. We now have opportunity to open permanent trade routs which will promote our furs and hopefully bring us nice sum of coins.
With our newly aquired Siberian lands, we now produce fur of such quality, that whole Europe wishes to buy them!
Boyars, harsh people living in harsh lands contested between Russians and Tartars, now make the bulk of our army. These man know no peace, only war and chaos it brings, and they are good at it.
Although Hussars originate in the far-away Balkans, even here, in forests and steppes of Russia their tactics are fearsome.
These ligtly armored horsemen have lived in steppes and grasslands for centuries. Their way of fighting is actally more a way of life. They are excellent reiders and light support cavalry.

Considered highest aristocracy, Boyars often held much power in Russian states throughout history. By allowing Boyars to be represented we aim to put them on our side, which can make a powerful ally, but one we must be very careful with.
With the establishment of Zemsky Sobori or local provincial parliaments, we are essentially passing administration of the local affairs to the smaller aristocracy.
Russian Sudebnik is an attempt to modernize the old ways of feudal law. We will give up some authority in favour of the local aristocracy for the prize of happier people.
Establish the title of the Russian Tsars.
Merge the Byzantine Double-Headed Eagle with the Russian heritige.
With Constantinople fallen and our royal ties to the Byzantine court, we are now the true heirs to the Throne of Rome.
It is now time to proclaim Autocephaly of the Russian Orthodox Church, as we are now the center of Orthodox world.
With Patriarchate, center of our Orthodox church, we are now one step closed to a fully authonomous, all Russian church.
Boyar Duma is a political council made up of Boyars - soliders and lower nobles, with purpose of giving coicil to the Russian kings.
Russian Boyars are unique members of the Russian society. They were lower nobles and aristocracy who could climb the political and social ladders through military service.
Russian version of the light cavalry answer to the development and increased use of gunpowerder weapons on the European battlefields.
Legendary Russian cavalry men using unique tactics and any weapons at hand, from long lances to pistols and guns, they were superior reiders and harassers for centuries.

For centuries Russians have had a long tradition of trade communications with Europe, based mostly on river trade. Now that Russia has acess to the northern harbors, we may finally esablish proper sea routes, giving us acess to rich Hanseatic and other ports.
Fur have always been associated with power and wealth, and now that we have established stable trade connections with the rich Europeans, we should export the famous Russian fur.
As it turns out, Europeans are so fond of the Russian fur, that there are now thousands of hunters all across the Siberian tundras trying to get the expensive fur for export.

Russian bardiche is not entirely unique Russian weapon, although it was mostly used in Russian lands instead of halberds Europeans preferred. It had a long curved blade, most likely dveloped from Nordic style two handed axe. Heavy usage of these weapons have led to unique infantry tactics that remained in Russian lands for centuries.
This is an attempt to combine centuries old experience of, somewhat static, infantry tactics developed around Russian bardiche with the emerging use of gunpowder weapons.
A transfer of legislative power, from kings to lower provincial aristocracy, designed to reduce administrative costs of maintaining government.

Creation of Zemsky Sobori, or local provincial parliaments is an attempt to create political room so that even lowest member of Russian society could participate in local government instead of openly revolting.
A uniquely Russian title, believed to be connected to Ceaser, or Emperor, alluding to the claim on Roman Throne.
With fall of Constantinople, many peoples across Europe with either royal or cultural ties to the Byzantine Empire adopted the famous Byzantine double-headed Eagle as their national insignia.
With Constantinople fallen, Russians can now claim to be Third Rome - cultural and spiritual continuation of the Roman Empire.
Autocephaly within Orthodox world means independance from, and equality with other Orthodox Christian Churches.
Excellent measures taken by our state's bureaucracy have led to an increase of provincial tax!

Transform our government into Devlet-i Ebed-muddet - The Eternal State, envisoned as the natural continuation of the Roman legacy carried over by the Greek Byzantine Empire, now rightfully Ottoman, once and for all.

With Constantinople in our hands, we have also gained one of the holiest places for people following Eastern Orthodox Christianity - city of Constantine. As old saying goes, keep your friends close but keep your enemies closer, this might actually give us opportunity to meddle with religious politics within Orthodox world. Keep in mind that this might cause religous problems in far away lands.

German Landsknechts were often mercenary pikemen who performed suporting roles for other foot soldiers on the battlefield. Their fighting style and usefulness on European battlefields led to many countries using these units for centuries.

German Order Knights represnt a special breed of men, usually of German origins, who travelled great distances in search for work - in their case - warfare. They are a fusion of lessons and experience gained in Holy Land and blacksmith skills developed within HRE.
Enact local laws that would allow us to put taxes on Sound Toll.
Enact local laws that would allow us to put taxes on Bosphorous Sound Toll.

Slavic Militia represent levied, often peasant, armies of Slavic countires throughout medieval period. Inexperienced, poorly equiped these bands of men could be seen anywhere from northern forests of the Rus', to the woodlands and hills of Balkan peninsula.
Infantry units comprised of season footmen armed with long poleaxes known as bardiches, trained and experienced in long-weapon formation fighting.

Members of noble families in various countries of Rus' origin, they often served as horsemen in times of need. Wealthy and influental, these men could afford the best war horses as well as the best avaialbe personal armors and weapons.

Aristocrates and powerful landowners, serving as shock cavarly during the times of war. Belonging to a different kind of nobility, compared to Boyars, they served directly their feudal overlord, not themselves, which meant that these horsemen resembled more proffesional cavalry units.

Russian Infantrymen recruited among the free tradespeople and rural population, armed with arquebus and usually a shorter version of bardiche often used as support for their firearm. First used between 1545. and 1550. these units were useed well untill the early 18th century.

Infantry formation aiming to simulate Western Tercio tactics. Cosnsisting of roughly 1/3 pikemen, firearm and melee troops, these units are versitle, durable but somewhat slow, barely capable of supporting huge cavalry armies that rule the East.
Footmen militia units comprised mostly of local peasants and Prussian tradesmen, employed as main infantry by German monastic orders.

Unlike Order Footmen, these units are reinforced and usually led by well experienced German Knights who brought back home the understanding of light cavalry warfare from the East. This knowledge will prove pricesless in the Eastern Europe.

Attempt to adopt Iberian style infantry warfare - slow moving mixed infantry formations, unlike their Western counterparts, heavily relying on firearms due to nature of Eastern Europe warfare. Lack of skilled and experienced manpower causes slightly less powerful overall unit.
Maunted version of heavily armored Italian mercenary Condotta Infantry. Powerful shock cavalry.

A special breed of Landsknechts, men who were prepaired to fight in the first battle lines, taking extra risk in exchange for double payment. They had 4:1 casualty rataio compared to common Landsknechts, however desperation made these men fight ferociously.
Doppelsoldners armed with special very long two-handed sword (Zweihander) designed to be affective agaisnt long-spear wielding infantry - such as Swiss pikemen.

Fresh new uniforms for our troops.
We have just received word that a mob of angry peasants looted one of our grain depots. It might get difficult to supply our troops if this continues.
One of our local armories has just been looted by local bandits and troublemakers. Not only did we lose valualbe supplies, now they are armed to the teeth!
This current war is taking heavy tall on our people. We just heard about large bands of forest bandits forming in one of the woodland regions!
Bandits! bandits everywhere! They even dared to raid one of the most important regional wool fairs!
The damn students and their teachers have just taken arms against our government! This is a rebellion!
We are informed that the Holy See has taken interest in one of the prominent scolars at our university. We are unsure of what the long-term effect will be, but we know that the Pope is not satisfied.
We are informed that the Holy See is not satisfied with our warmongering. We should consider peace.

Despite the hard times our country faced in $YEAR$, due to excellent administration and favorable season, $PROVINCENAME$ saw a great harvest. We could take advantage of this situation by filling our treasury with additional gold, or we could ease the heavy burden of war.

Recent appearance of good quality fur on our markets, originating in $PROVINCENAME$, has provided us with an opportunity to squeeze some gold from local fur merchants, or let them invest their new forture into further development of the local trade.
We can't trust them with money.
Let them keep the money, they've earned it.
Our fishing folk inform us of ecellent catch this season. Fish is the healthiest meat and healthy people are happy people.
How many can you feed with a fish? Hmm.

Salt is essential for human life, just as much as water or food. During the times of trouble, such as wars or starvation, salt can get more valuable than gold. Taxing salt trade brings ****loads of money.
During these harsh times, many minorities feel neglected or openly discriminated by our courts and local governments. This discontent can spread like wildfire if we don't act.
Revolts come and go, like seasons.
Revolt is spreading among minorities within our county, we need to do something before they take arms and rebel!
Discontent or discriminated members of cultural minority in our state.
One of the religious officals has managed to convert local unbelievers en masse!
The people are with us in our holy war!
Local peasants flock to join our righteous armies!
Dire times are ahead, our harbor masters have decided to sell their stock of naval supplies to finance our latest campaign!
Even though we are currently at war, our people feel safe knowing that granaries are filled up. Nobody will worry about winter this year!
Opportunistic unbelievers have risen against us!
A falling piece of rock and flaming debris just hit our neighbour's province!
Tell your peasants Divine is with you!
Opportunistic members a cultural minority have risen against us!
Opportunistic grain merchants from one of our provinces are moving their businesses closer to the Center of Trade.
This could be good to us.
After some times of horrible state instability, someone managed to assassinate our ruler! Some even say nobody bothered to protect them.
The kind is dead? Long live the king.
After some times of horrible state instability, someone managed to assassinate our heir! Some even say nobody bothered to protect them.
Because of our horrible state of affairs, someone managed to assassinate our ruler! Some even say nobody bothered to protect them.
The kind is dead? Long live the king.
After some times of horrible state instability, someone managed to assassinate our heir! Some even say nobody bothered to protect them.
In faith we can find salvation.
One of our textile manufactories produced textile of such great quality, it's starting to attract mechants from all over the region. Perhaps we can learn something from this lucky "mistake".
A breakthrough in textile proucing technology. Could lead to increased overall production.
Act of Kreva, document related to Polish-Lithuanian commonwealth.
There are rumors among our people that our national bank is in trouble. We need to sort our finances very soon!
A large sum of money has disappeared from our national treasuty. Many suspect that the current state of disorder is to blame for this lack of care.

Our spies have forged certain documents, so upon death of a certain noble, state gets it all. Only problem is, this noble wasn't very fond of the current government.

A powerful group of our merchants agreed to support the government in its time of crisis.
A powerful group of our bureaucrats have shown great initiative in dealing with the current state of crisis.
Some of our local official might have been a bit overzealous when it comes to collecting taxes: peasants are complaining like always, but money is being collected.
We have just heard news from one of our provinces that a large sum of gold has been found stolen by a corrupt official. The gold is on its way to our capital.
Due to bureaucratic mistake, upon death of one of our merchants, no relatives were found listed for inheritance. Instead, everything was appropriated by the government.
A capable young general was just promoted into rank of General. Our already Grand Army is now even more powerful.

During the last war, a young promising military officer has made a name for himself by leading a legendary cavalry charge in a decisive moment of the battle. It is now time to promote him to a rank of General as reward for his outstanding military service.

Represents an attempt to enlarge the Ottoman army, particularly the cavarly, where free horsemen would serve the Ottoman sultan as standing cavarly, a service that would be rewarded wtih land fief called a timar.

Represents standardization of the Ottoman cavarly, providing sultan with two basic typles of cavarly: Sipahis or the timarli system (feudal levies) and Kapikulu Sipakis private salaried professional cavarly units of the Porte. At the same time, this system would still enable use of non Ottoman horsemen in times of need, such as various tribal cavalries, as well as mercenaries, that were treated separatly

Represents a centuries long tradition of armies primarily made up of slaves, across pre-Islamic world from India, over Persia across Central Asian steppes, all the way to Africa and parts of Europe. Steady demand for slave soldiers developped a huge slave markets, remnant of which can still be found in Azow and Kaffa.
Ghilmans - originally mentioned by Qur'an, creatures, servants of righteous Muslims in paradise. In Persian, later Mughal and Ottoman traditions, a special breed of elite slave sildiers.
Ghilmans - originally mentioned by Qur'an, creatures, servants of righteous Muslims in paradise. In Persian, later Mughal and Ottoman traditions, a special breed of elite slave sildiers.
Represents lessons in military strategy learned from Mamluk conquests of Egypt and northern Africa, passed through different cultures all across the world connected by Islamic faith.
With Constantinople in our hand, claimimg the title of Protector of the Roman legacy, will allow us to eventually govern a number of different European peoples. As long as they recognize our claim.
Claiming Caplih of Islam will give as unique position in the Muslim world, one of great prestige and power.

Tercio is a new and innovative way of using different infantry types combined into a single fighting force capabale of facing any threat, both close up and at range. It aims to fill its ranks with 1/3 pikemen, 1/3 archers or musketeers and 1/3 swordsmen (or other melee weapon types).
Our troops have raided and liberated valuable merchandise from enemy merchants.

Despite still being at war, some of our military leaders have received large strips of fertile land. On one side, after this token of apreciation, our armies are behind the leadership, on the other, people are not pleased with this.
A sizeable sum of money has been found in our treasury. We are not quite sure how it got there.
A sizeable sum of money has disappeared from our treasury. After days of guard's interrogation, we still don't know how it happened.

Our current state's instability is seen as time of opportunities for some of our Nobles.

Some of our military commanders have abandoned their troops. Demoralized soldiers have split into gangs that are terrorizing local population. There are already talks of rebellion, as well as lack of faith in our leadership!
Being a feudal state at peace can be bad. Without war, our lords and large landowners have no way of increasing their influence, other than fighting eachother.
Being a feudal state at war is what feudalisme is all about. Given the external enemy to fight for crown and personal prestige, our lords and large landowners have mush less time to fight each other.

Being a feudal state at war is what feudalisme is all about. Given the external enemy to fight for crown and personal prestige, our lords and large landowners have mush less time to fight each other. From time to time, we may even claim some of the spoils for ourselves.
Our current form of government allows many small and large landowners to rise in social ranks. Many of these people also manage to gain large political influence.
The recent infamous action are starting to hurt our reputation.
The recent infamous action are starting to hurt our reputation.
Our high infamy is starting to affect the stability of our nation.

We are informed by our High Miltary Council that an army officer of ours is ready for a promotion to the rank of General. Should we procede with this promotion, and let the army handle it, or recruit a more suitable person ourselves?.

Becoming King is hard. On the one side, the number of existing crowns has always been somewhat low, on the other side, those few that did exist, were always held or claimed by many. So, the best way to do it, was to proclaim yourself a King, but in order to be taken seriously you needed land to support your claims.
By reforming into Feudal March, we have the opportunity to bypass the religious authorities above us, and start our own dinasty.
By enacting this reform we will reogranize our tribal state into a more ogranized country.

Enter the age of Absolutism, time when the Crown is the Supreme authority, limited by no other earthly institution.

Constantinopolis is the most beautiful city in the whole world. Its riches surpass any other known city, its walls are so tall that no army in the world could breach them. With Constantinople - city of legendary Constantine, in our hands, nothing can stop us.

Constantinopolis is the most beautiful city in the whole world. Its riches surpass any other known city, and its walls are so tall that no army in the world could breach them. With Constantinople - city of legendary Constantine, in our hands, nothing can stop us.
Attempt to emulate the legendary organization of the Roman army, as well as adopt its systems of transportation and supply.

Rome. One word at which every barbarian tribe trebles. Over a thousand years of organized army, counless battles, immortal generals and legendary leaders, discipline matched by nothing else - one word Rome.

The times when legendary Roman heavy infantry dominated battlefields by sheer force of will and discipline, are long gone. Various Arab and Turkic peoples are not like Rome's old adversaries. Large light cavalry formations supported by skilled archers will require a different approach.

Eastern Roman empire faces enemies unlike anything old Rome had to deal with. These new peoples coming from Caucasus and Persia are not here to loot and plunder, they came to conquer and rule. So too our ways of warfare have to change to match the challenges ahead.

An elite unit made up of Nordic warriors with legendary warrior skill. They are like nothing we've had or seen before, and they are worth every coin. What they lack in discipline of seasoned soldiers, they more than make up with sheer shock.

Hire an elite company of Nordic warriors who sailed from Scandinavia through Rus' lands in search of gold and glory. Their warrior culture accompanied by ferocious battlefield rage is nothing like we've seen before.

This represents the earliest form of land-regulating laws defining the basic taxation duties between land owners and rulers.
This represents the earliest form of land-regulating laws defining the basic taxation duties between land owners and rulers.

Feudal system works by distributing land and local authority from the hands of one man into the hands of many. This privilege of ruling comes at the price defined by Feudal Contract granting soverign taxation rights over all vassals.

Feudal system works by distributing land and local authority from the hands of one man into the hands of many. This privilege of ruling comes at the price defined by Feudal Contract granting soverign taxation rights over all vassals.
Changing the Taxation laws, or enacting new ones that either change old, or define new duties between land owners and rulers, always causes some sort of trouble.
This set of laws and regulations is designed to further feudalize our state by giving local rulers more rights within their own domains.
This set of laws and regulations is designed to further feudalize our state by giving local rulers more rights within their own domains.
Although feudalization as a system is designed to provide internal stability, enacting feudal laws which affect lives of ordinary people can be cause of riots and rebellions.

For decades, even centuries nobility had enjoyed privileges granted to them by the feudal contract. So much so, that at many times it was noblity and not the kings that held the true power. Any attempt to change the social order in which nobility is priviliged will be met by strong resistence.

This set of laws is designed to slowly put an end to the decentralization of our incomes. No longer will any group of priviliged be excused from taxation, and no longer will our government's authority be challenged.
This set of laws is designed to slowly put an end to the decentralization of our incomes.
Our recent state policies are yeilding sizeable results: our merchants are starting to trade all over the known world.
Adopt Early Form of State Guarantees

When it comes to trade within your own state, its something that requires very little governing, market regulates itself, more or less. However, real profit lies in the inter-state exchange of goods. State Business Guarantees are one of the first forms of official state diplomacy, a practice of issueing trade rights to foreign merchants, giving them assurances that their businesses wont be harmed by the state in order to attract them.

One of the earliest forms of inter-state official diplopmacy, designed to provide foreign merchants guarantees that thier trade wont be harmed by politics, attratcing merchants from far away lands to our trade centers.

Enact a special set of laws intended to provide a legal framework within feudal social order for the developing new class of rich individuals. These men and women are neither traditional aristocracy nor serfs, and the amount of wealth they are gaining makes them a powerful potential political factor.
The basic legal framework designed as transition between feudal age and serfdom to a more modernized society and emerging middle class.

Inter-state trade is something relatively new. Even though there is large wealth to be had in trade, only a very few very capable groups of people have been able to reap its full benifits. Result of our recent expedition to find the fur source.

A messenger has just arrived carrying news that our noble expedition has encountered friendly natives willing to trade valuable furs for our commodities such as iron tools, small weapons and food. First samples of the precious Samur fur have arrived. Our nobles have invested additional money, so the first merchant caravans are leaving our capital following the path of the expedition.
The first merchant caravan has just enetered the capital's gates. Its carrying load of valuable furs which will make our people rich - and happy.
Word just arrived that one of the fur caravans has been attacked - all merchants and entire military escort was found dead with cargo gone. This is trully sad news for our people.

Grieving families of the recently deceased nobles on their brave expedition, have gathered generous donations and financed construction of a temple in one of our provinces, dedicated to their loved ones.
Grieving families of the recently deceased nobles, are blaiming our Royal Court for their loss. This outrageous behavior has inspired local rabble to rise up and openly revolt against our state.

Our merchants informed us that they have negotiated a grain export deal with a certain Western county currently embroiled at war. They are waiting on our approval to send the final offer to the Westerners.
We have been approached by merchants from a far away Eastern country. The have offered us a Grain Export treaty which will greatly help our current war efforts. Should we sign this agreement?
No, our soldiers will never eat foreign grain!
The westerners have agreed to our generous offer. This deal will bring prosperity to both our nation and grain business.
Our grain export business with the West expands to another grain producing province, if this keeps up, it will surely make us very rich.
One of our grain producing province which is part of the grain export business, reports of a sizeable increase in its taxation coming mostly from large increase in local grain trade.
Due to large economic activity and general development, one of our provinces becomes rich.
Due to large economic activity in its immediate neighbourhood, one of our provinces becomes prosperous.
Due to large economic activity, local merchants in one of our provinces invested in construction of marketplace.

One of our glorious generals has shown great personal curage in battle. Since our throne is currently heirless our advisers have already prepaired documents legalizing offical adoption and promotion within our succession line.
Iron export business booms in one of our provinces. Local officials are asking for guidance, since this increase in production could be used to stimulate different kinds of products.

We have received reports from our local officials based on $PROVINCENAME$, that the local peasants have created large clearings within of province forests. They ask that we finance a small part of this endevour which will produce large strips of fertile land.
But this province is sooo far away...

Our peasants have finished clearing forests in one of our provinces, and now lots of free and fertile land is being settled by our people. We could invest some money in the local road network, or let things develop on their own.
Our peasants have finished clearing forests in one of our provinces. We are told that the local settlers have found, and started exploiting great source of wood which could be used for shipbuilding.

As a result of bureaucratic expansion in our capital, many of the local nobles are openly fighting against the powerful merchants who are hiring mercenary regiments. It looks like the merchants will gain the upper hand, which leaves us the option of supporting them, or attempting to stay out and see how things develop.

As a result of bureaucratic expansion in our capital, many of the local merchants are openly fighting against the powerful nobles who are raising their own private armies. It looks like the aristocrats will gain the upper hand, which leaves us the option of supporting them, or attempting to stay out and see how things develop.

In-fighting between our nobles and merchants for the political power within our state is starting to turn into a full blown civil war, with each faction saying that the other side is trying to usurp the throne. It is time to end this, so we must choose which side we shall support.

Because of the power struggle between nobles and merchants, many of our peasants are suffering, usually from both sides equally. Peasants are growing tired of this state of unrest, and there are even talks of open rebellion.
We have just received word that our strongest Merchants Guild have endorsed the ongoing bureaucratic reforms.

We have just received word from the representatives of our most influential noble families, that all members of the lower and higher aristocracy have seen wisdom of our bureaucratic reform, and are now oppenly supporting it.

The unhappiness of our peasants over the current state of affairs, has turned into open full-blown peasant rebellion. We have heard news that large groups of peasants are gathering all over the country side.

While attempting to resolve a local legal matter, one of the minor nobles commited an act of cruelty. Already unhappy peasants gathered into a large crowd demanding justice, so the ring leaders had to be put to sword. Situation is under control - for the time being - but peasants now feel persecuted and still whisper of justice demands.

Many of the local peastants decided that they've had enoug of noble customs, and now want to get the justice themselves. Many are leaving their homes to become road bandits, so the entire country side is turning into a war zone. At the same time the nobles are pushing their own agenda to gain even more power over the lower classes.
Due to the overall chaos and devastation in the countryside, the harvest fails due to the lack of manpower to work the fields. This is a huge problem, as without grain imports we will soon starve.
Due to the current state of chaos and devastation in the country side, some of the local people have taken arms against our goverment. We need to put an end to this once and for all.
Due to the current state of chaos and devastation in the country side, some of the local people have taken arms against our goverment. We need to put an end to this once and for all.

We just received news that the people have rebelled in one of our provinces because the local nobles had attempted to reintroduce some old laws and customs.
Since they've been granted special favor recently, some of our nobles have siezed the opportunity to grab even more power for themselves and their families.
Since they've been granted special favor recently, many of our nobles are openly supporting the government.

column2: Represents support of the country religion's leadership. It is a rare gift to be viewed as a holy man during one's life, but still a very powerful gift to those few who are deemed desrving by the history of their nation.

Being a ruler in a Boyar-dominated society can be a very dangerous thing. If secure their support, there is very little you can't do, only problem is that their immediate support usually comes at a high price later on, something most rulers in the Eastern Europe learned very quickly.
Satisfied with the state of religion affairs in our country, a local provincial paroch donates a generous amount of money to the state.
You don't see this every day.
A serious crisis is about to errupt between our nobles and members of the Church. To prevent more drastic consequences we must step in and support one side.
Satisfied with the state of religion affairs in our state, a local provincial paroch donates a generous amount of money to the state.
You don't see this every day.
A recently deceased member of our Royal family is proclaimed as saint.
Our religion enters the Golden Age of monastic art and literature.

The monks in one of our remote monasteries are producing icons so beautiful that countless serfs from all over our country, inspired by the stories of their miraculous properties, are taking the pilgrimage to this holy site.
A recently built church has been consecrated. During the servise the entire court and noblity saw the royal faimily at their best. Weeks later, everyone will still talk about how good we all looked.
With Churche's support, who could possibly doubt our divine right to rule...

Despite being given royal blessing, our merchants have failed to arrange grain export deal with the Westerners, aparently their ruler failed to see the wisdom and benefit to his people from this deal.
Angry mod have killed one of the local constables while collecting taxes. As a result our officials are frightened.
Adopt a set of laws and legislations designed to define relations between various interest groups within our society.
Adopt a set of laws and legislations designed to define relations between various interest groups within our society.
Adopt a set of laws and legislations designed to define relations between various interest groups within our society.
A set of laws and legislations designed to define relations between various interest groups within our society.
A set of laws and legislations designed to further improve relations between our subjects regardless of culture or origin.
A set of laws and legislations designed to promote unity of all people within our sovereign domain, regardless of culture, religion or any other distinction.
Represents reaction to the introduction of social reforms desgined to change the traditional balance of power within our society.
Our court of Wards and Liveries wishes to press an additional tax upon our merchants. Should we support or oppose this idea?
Our court of Wards and Liveries wishes to press an additional tax upon our nobles. Should we support or oppose this idea?
Our court of Wards and Liveries has managed to collect extra tithes.
Our court of Wards and Liveries has managed to collect extra war taxes. The collected sum is substential, and could either be used to support the war efforts, or to help out the economy.
One of our local officials, working for the court of Wards and Liveries, was ambushed and murdered bringing collected taxes back to the capital. A local group of bandits is suspected.
One of the local provincial commanders became famous during the recent military campaign. At first, it was the men under his command, now, everyone across our nation celebrates the hero's name.

Our military leaders have ordered local city officials to force poor men without any income into military service. This move will surely bring the badly needed menpower, but it will also lower the quality of our armies. Our people are terrified, whispers of press gangs crusing the streets are causing much turmoil.
One of our offifers has been promoted into Recruitmaster. His efforts could greatly improve the amount of menpower available to our military leaders.

Our military leaders, as well as most trusted advisers, have proposed creation of a special body of soldiers, an elite unit tasked only with the protection of the Royal Court. Should we procede, or keep relying on more traditional military organization?

Now that we have established Royal Guard, we are asked by its commanders to provide them with headquarters. It was recently proposed that they should be located within our capital. Should we allow this, or seek some other arranagement?

With all the warring going on in our neighbourhood, these days we have many foreign soldiers within our borders. Right now they are mostly drunk mercenaries or good-for-nothing bandits, but they could also be used to fill up the ranks of our own army, if we cough up enough coins. How should we procede?

A group of foreign warriors, who had arrived to one of our provinces looking for employment, have asked us for the permission to establish a mercenary guild. Such a guild could provide great benefits to our military potential, but it should also be kept under close eye. What should our answer be?
As a result of chaos in the country side, the infrastructure in one of our provinces fails into disarray.
As a result of chaos and devastation in the country side, a bandit guild was formed in one of our provinces.
A local bandit guild hurts the provincial economy. Our officlas are powerless to stop them.
An elite formation of soldiers designed to provide protection to the county's Royal Court.
Home to our country's Royal Guard.
Seanal events that aim to attract foreign soldiers and press them into service working for our country.
A local guild of foreign soldiers, attracting experienced warriors from the lands of our neighbours.
A group of theives, bandits and other kinds of lowlife organized into a Guild in order to make even greater devastation on local economy.
We now have the opportunity to press claims on this piece of land.

We have heard that local nobles in one of our provinces have overworked their serfs during the last season, gaining large amount of wealth. We could attempt to claim some of it, or try to hire some workers to help the poor peasants out.
Inspired by our recent open support of serfdom policies, some of the minor nobles and large landowners have started lobbying for even stronger support of serfdom by the government.
Because of our recent open support of freedom policies, the wealthy merchants and many from the craftsmen guild have started lobbying for further support of freedom by the government.
Opportunistic nobles are demanding concessions that would further increase serdom policies of our state.
Large group of bandits have settled one of our provinces, intercepting and looting shipments of grain. This is starting to hurt our economy.
What started as minor group of grain thieves have grown into Bandit Guild, that is rampaging all over the country side. We must do something before this turns into even more trouble.
We now have the opportunity to press claims on this piece of land.

A group of our nobles ask for the permission to make a royal visit to a foreign court. We could allow this, and let them handle the diplomatic issues, or we could send our own envoys instead. How should we proceed?
Local border communities from one of our own and a neighbouring province, develop local trade. We could let the locals handle it, or establish our own trading post. How should we proceed?
Should we try to conclude a royal marriage with a culturally close foreign court?
Our royal envoy at the neighbour's court was insulted. Many nobles and powerful merchants demand action. What should we do?
Our arrogant envoy at the neighbour's court was imprisoned. Many nobles and powerful merchants demand action. What should we do?
As a smaller neighbour is currently embroiled at war, our capable marshall tells us that we could attempt to forge some documents and scheme our way into their court. What should we do?
Should we send royal envoys to a foreign court? We could also establish more permanent diplomatic presence for a small investment.
Our Noble ruler has been hunting recently with one our neighbouring rulers. During their adventures, the two had developed great personal relations. As a result our courts are also closer than ever.
Our Marshall wants to fund the opposition made up of minor nobles and disatisfied landowners our neighbour's country. Should we allow this?
We have received reports that one of our neighbours is funding opposition within our state. We can handle this without much problem, but such practice should be stopped.
Insult! We heard the news that a foreign court deemed us "not worthy" of a royal marriage!
A group of nombles from a neighbour's court just arrived to our capital on a diplomatic mission. How should we handle them?
Our nobles, who on their own initiaive went on a diplomatic mission, have just returned home with gifts from a foreign court!

Local communities develop trade with a neighbouring province, whose owner has recently established a trade post. Should we invest some money into establishing our own trade post, or let the local merchants handle it?
We have been offered a marriage proposal, between ours and a neighbouring royal court. Should we accept this proposal?

We have been approached by the enovys from a foreign court with the proposal of establishing permanent diplomatic relations. We could let them settle in on their own, or offer special accomodations near the palace?

Our nobles feel both culturally and spiritually close to the court of one of our neighbours. Should we attempt to build upon these feelings of similarity and mutual trust, or remind our nobles that their focus beloing primarily back at home?
Have nobles take care of the home.

Waging war and conquering land - by any means, seem to be traits of not only us, but one of our neighbours as well. Feared and shunned by everyone else, should we try to improve relations between our states, or rather focus more on our own standing among other countries?
We should focus on our own repentance.

One of our neighbouring rulers is a barely capable fool not worthy of respect, lacking personal charisma so much that even their own armies don't recognize any royal authority, while the Elector Princes tell jokes on their behalf. This situation is an embarrassment of the entire Empire and should be ended once and for all.
Fabricate claims as prelude for an invasion.

One of our neighbouring rulers is an illegitimate pretender who only rose to power via brute use of force. Being highly respected and an examplary monarchy, such an unrecognized neighbour, probably even without protection of the Emperor, should be an excellent opportunity for our expansion.
State our claims and assemble the armies!

Our neighbour is suffering from a long period of weak government. Such an interior weakness is like an invitation for the opportunistic foreign invasion. Should we try to gain something from this situation?
We settle our disputes with words, not swords.

Our loyal advisers tell us that we have an opportunity to improve relations with a fellow Elector state of the Holy Roman Empire, or try to improve relations with the Emperor himself. How should we procede?
Our fate is with the Emperor.

Some of our clerics are proposing a more dynamic foreign policy, one that would rely more on diplomatic relations with other Theocracies within the Holy Roman Empire. Aristocracy, on the other hand, thinks we should stick to the Emperor and enjoy peace and prosperity.

Rome demands that we submit to the Ultimate Authority of the Mother Church and political powers in Vatican. If we accept this, we will in essence welcome the Holy See into our political life, granting future Popes right to tell us what to do on all levels, but if we refuse, we could potentially suffer great consequences both within Holy Roman Empire and by the hands of our fellow Catholics.

As a result of our affiliation with the Pope, many members of the clergy have gained substential amounts of power within our state. As a result they are now demanding more conservative policies that would be inlign with Holy See.
As a result of our affiliation with the Pope, Holy See has requested that we adjust our decentralization policies allowing more control from the Vatican over our possessions.
Take you hands off my gold!

As a result of our affiliation with the Pope, Holy See has requested that we adjust our serfdom policies in order of preventing individuals, as well as unruly preachers, from underminding the authority of the Mother Church by spreading unorthodox ideas and heresies.
One of our neighbouring rulers has terrible relations with the Emperor, unlike us. Should we try to use our favor with the Emrperor to try to fabricate some claims and expand our possessitions?
Submit to the authority of the Pope.

Bureacracy spreads to one of our provinces!
We now have the opportunity to press claims on this piece of land.
Tax reform produces results: a tax value in one of out provinces rises.
Tax reform produces results: a tax value in one of out provinces rises.
Tax reform produces results: a tax value in one of out provinces rises.

One of the incompetent neighbouring rulers is a laughing stock of the entire Holy Roman Empire. It is our duty as the Elector state of the Empire to put an end to this so-called "independence" once and for all!

One of the incompetent neighbouring rulers is a laughing stock of the entire Holy Roman Empire. It is within our power to gain a legitimate claim to their throne and end their so-called "independence" once and for all!
One of our neighbours is suffering from very low prestige among their rival countries. This is seen as a sign of weakness by many, surely it is only a question of time before someone makes a claim.
We have chosen the path of peace.

One of our beligerant neighbours, currently embroiled at war, is suffering from very low prestige. This is seen as a sign of weakness by many, our advisers tell us that it is only a question of time before someone takes the chance and presses the claim. How should we procede?
We have chosen the path of peace.
One of our incapable neighbours is locked in a prolonged war. Our loyal advisers are telling us to seize the opportunity and make a claim on their holdings. What should we do?

One of our neighbouring rulers is suffering from very low legitimacy, which is starting to make many question their right to rule. With this whole mess, some are suggesting that if we were to press a claim, it would be accepted as legitimate one, by the most. What should we do?

One of our neighbouring rulers is suffering from very low legitimacy, which is starting to make many question their right to rule. With this whole mess, some are suggesting that if we were to press a claim, it would be accepted as legitimate one, by the most. What should we do?

One of our neighbouring rulers is having a great deal of problems with their foreign relations, specially those within Holy Roman Empire. Many suspect this to be the case of combination of incapable officials and foreign interference. In either case, we can use this opportunity to lay a claim to their holdings which would be recognized as legitimate by many.
One of our neighbouring countries is currently embroiled in a war that they are clearly losing. This is a rare opportunity or weakness we should take an advantage of, before someone else does.

Local authorities from $PROVINCENAME$, are ask us for guidance: recently they have been approached by wealthy merchants belonging to two different guilds, one wishing to export the grain, other to develop local market. What should we tell them?
Exporting goods has the hugest priority.

Our wise choice to specialize one of our grain provinces into grain exporter has finally payed off. Again, their officials are asking for guideance, as the recent wealth could be used to further improve the provincial economy or, with small investment from our end, make large scale investment for the coming decades.
Improve the local economy even more.
Recent grain business development pays off for all involved parties.
Recent grain business development pays off for all involved parties.
Recent grain business development pays off extra profits for all involved investors.
Recent grain business development leads to construction of a marketplace by the local merchant guild. This act was seen as gratitude for the government's exceptional focus on national trade policies.
Inspired by the merchant guild who built a marketplace in a neighbouring province, another guild under our national focus decides to the same.
Inspired by the merchant guild who built a marketplace in a neighbouring province, another guild far away from our national focus decides to the same.
Inspired by tales of holy warriors of the past, told by local priests, our peasants on their own initiative gathered large sum of gold to help fund our current war.
The current state of war has bled all able men, and as a result harvest fails in one of our provinces.

Local merchants in one of our provinces have managed to improve agriculture so much that their trade income has attracted merchants from all over our country. Extra trade is also brining extra profits.

Lack of accurate maps and recognized country borders has created an opportunity for us to fabricate a claim on a piece of land inhabited by people with strong cultural ties to us, currently owned by our neighbour. Doing so will hurt the diplomatic relations, but on the other hand, claiming new land will make us more powerful. What should we do?

Our loyal advisers tell us that we may attempt to lay claims to a province inhabited by people of simlar cultural customs to our own. Aparently, our dominion over their land is more preferable to that of a foreign ruler with strange customs and different traditions. What should we do?
Our loyal advisers tell us that we may attempt to lay claims to a province inhabited by our people currently held by a ruler of similar cultural traditions. How should we procede?

We now have the opportunity to claim a province held by one of our culturally close but weaker neighbours. Attempting to unite our culture under rule of one state could be seen as threat by courts both near - and far away from us. What should we do?

Our nobles inform us that our neighbouring ruler is a person barely worth the title and position, incapable of inspiring loyalty even in those closest around them. This situation could be siezed as an opportunity to fabricate claim on their land and unite both lands under our rule once and for all. What should we do?
Scheme our way into their court.

Our loyal advisers inform us that one of the neighbouring rulers is suffering from a very low reputation due to their hostile and aggressive policies toward their neighbour. Because of our excellent foreign diplomacy, we could press claim on their land, and nobody would really mind. Should we do it?

One of our noble neighbours is suffering from a rather low ruler's legitimacy, deteriorated most likely as result of recent wars and court scheming. In any case, this is an opportunity for us to press claim on their land, one that nobody could dispute. Should we do it?

One of our noble neighbours is suffering from a rather low ruler's legitimacy, deteriorated as result of disasterious ongoing wars. This is seen, by many, as an opportunity for us to press claim on their land, one that nobody could dispute. Should we do it?

One of our rival neighbours is suffering from a rather low state prestige, which is causing other foreign powers around us, as well many within their own state, to think less of their government every day. Should we attemt to press a claim their land?
One of our rival neighbours is suffering from low state stability. Should we press claim on their land?
One of our rival neighbours is suffering from horrible war losing one battle after another. Some are suggesting that we take this opportunity and clam their land. Should we do it?
One of our rival neighbours is suffering from horrible war losing one battle after another. Some are suggesting that we take this opportunity and clam their land. Should we do it?
One of our rival neighbours is suffering from horrible war losing one battle after another. Some are suggesting that we take this opportunity and clam their land. Should we do it?

Warriors from a foreign Knightly Order have conquered lands inhabited by our people. There are many, both here at home and abroad, who say we should make claim to these lands, and liberate our people from the foreign rule. However, these Knights are a serious fighting force, one that should not be taken lightly. What should we do?
We must set our people free!

Warriors from a foreign Knightly Order have conquered lands inhabited by people culturally close to our own. It is rumoured that if we were to press a claim on their land, their nobility as well as peasants, would support it. Aparently they would all prefer our rule to that of the foreigners. How should we procede?

One of our neighbours is suffering from weak government, horrible administration and a total lack of political vision. Should we take an advantage of this situation and make a claim on their lands, surely in this state of apathy, nobody could deny us?

One of our neighbours is suffering from weak government, horrible administration and a total lack of political vision. Should we take an advantage of this situation and make a claim on their lands, surely in this state of apathy, nobody could deny us?

Claiming to have been led by Divine Intervention, our Marshall managed to forge certain documents and maps that would allow us to claim land owned by one of our rivals with very little respect for religious matters. Should we make these documents public?

One of our neighbours is suffering from failing administration. Their country is falling apart, as most institutions are slowly slipping away from their control. If we were to press our claim now, there would be no one left in their country strong enough to oppose us. Should we do this?
Wolf does not make peace with sheep!
Represents Golden Horde's dominion over various successor states of the medeival Kievan Rus' cultural sphere.

Beginning in $YEAR$, $COUNTRY$ faced almost a decade of utter chaos slowly consuming the country from within and bringing it to the verge of collapse. Our nation is struggling both socially and economically as famine and war plague our nation and the growing opposition against the aristocracy and church has resulted in a series of rebellions and assassination attempts against the monarch.
Dire times are ahead of us!
A powerful nobled had siezed lands that rightfully belong to the Church. This act happened without serious consequences during or immediately after, however some are concerned about noble's boldness.
Feeling threatened by the increasing state instability, our Church asks us for protection against further trespasses against its clergy as well as property.
Let the hooded fools fend for themselves!
Having refused to protect the Church, we have incurred wrath of the God's representatives on Earth. As a result our legitimacy to the throne is severely shaken.
Having refused to protect the Church, we have incurred wrath of the God almighty! Priests are spreading rumors about horrors of hell that awaits all those who oppose the will of the Church!
Having refused to protect the Church, we have incurred wrath of the clergy. Zealous prechers have persuaded people in one of our provinces to take arms against our most serene government!

Having refused to protect the Church, we have incurred wrath of the entire clergy as well as many of our nobles, some of whome hold critical posts in our government. Inspired by zealous preachers, many have taken arms against us, in what is quickly turning into a Holy War against the state!

Having refused to protect the Church, we have incurred wrath of the entire clergy as well as many of our nobles, some of whome hold critical posts in our government. Inspired by zealous preachers, many have taken arms against us, in what is quickly turning into a Holy War against the state!

Having refused to protect the Church, we have incurred wrath of the entire clergy as well as many of our nobles, some of whome hold critical posts in our government. Inspired by zealous preachers, many have taken arms against us, in what is quickly turning into a Holy War against the state!
Having refused to protect the Church, we have secured support of many nobles!
Having refused to protect the Church, we have secured support of nobility. As a token of gratitude, they have collected a generous donation that would help us fight all those who oppose our wisdom!
Suffering from conflicts, both internal and external, many are questioning the current dynasty's right to rule.
As a result of current state instability, there are some who question weather our liege is fit to rule.

We are informed about nasty whispers circulating the court: aparently some nobles are questioning the very purpose of monarchy! Who could possibly be so blind, to be willing to entrust the future of our people - to our people... Trully such a notion is a complete nonsens!
Encouraged by our current weakness, a rivaling ruler makes a nasty remark on behalf of our noble liege.
A neighbouring ruler refused to negotiate with our envoys on a routine diplomatic mission. Us being unable to respond is seen as a sign of weakness.
Vicious rumors abour our royal family spread to another court via royal marriage.
Vicious rumors abour our royal family spread to another court by the travelling nobles.
Vicious rumors abour our royal family reach the Holy See. It seems, Pope is disappointed in us.
One of our loyal advisers resigned his office today. We believe those vicious rumors against our most noble royal family, is the reason for this sudden act.

One of our loyal advisers attempted to organize and lead a coup! Thank heavens they only got to the palace gate where our brave guardsmen cut them to pieces. Nevertheless, this was a huge blow on our authority.
Stories appear raising questions about our heir's moral integrity and virtue, making their rightful claim to the throne seem weaker than it is.
A Bishop, former friend of our liege and ruler of a friendly theocracy has denounced us. Aparently he was deeply disappointed in our moral integrity, all because of these vicious rumors.
True friends are hard to find.

A group of conspirators led a successful palace coup. The former ruler was cought in bedchaimber on sleep, and was quickly put to death. This will have severe consequences both on internal and external level.

A group of conspirators have managed to assassinate our favorite heir! They were all caught and executed immediately after their dark deed, however the damage is done. We are officially in state of mourning until the next heir is appointed.
Unite various Turkic tribes into a single, powerful nation.
Our beloved heir was assassinated, to make things even worse, we have no idea who do it!
Our beloved heir was assassinated, to make things even worse the culprits have escaped!
Our most noble and curageous heir was assassinated! As he was leading troops through a narrow valley, his colum got ambushed by cowardly assassins.
Members of the royal family are demanding that we lower the crown authority granting them more power, or they will refuse to recognize our heir!
An elder member of our royal faimily has denounced the current heir as rightful claimant to the throne!
On a public meeting between lower nobles and powerful merchants, our heir has managed to forget parts of important ceremony, causing many to laugh at their lack of princely manners.
